intro.heading: IKAY, your digital fingerpring
intro.content1: Hi, I'm Nando Mu√±oz , IKAY is a tool that you can visualize, identify and manage your fingerprint.
intro.content2: Next, I will show you a dashboard with part of the information that you delive to a website, every time you access by your browser. If you want to know more, you can read my article on the subject (Only in Spanish üôÅ)

main.noSupport: Your browser does not support this functionality. Good for your privacy, may be :D

aboutme.heading: About me
aboutme.content1: Frontend Senior, expert in the ecommerce with more than 7 years of experience on platforms like Hybris and Salesforce Commerce Cloud . Working developer and lead of a international Frontend team. Also passionate about design and UX.
aboutme.content2: You can contact me by Github,Twitter or Linkedin

footer.title: Status of your data
footer.content1: All data shown on this website is save only on your device, never will be stored in a external server, why? because I'm not interested in your data, I'm interested in your awareness.
footer.content2: However, I don't know if GitHub (the server hosting) or ipapi.co (external API that I use to determine your city, country and telephone company from your IP) generate any type of data storage similar to shown on this website. But hey, if you are not worried about sharing every dinner, moment, memory or feeling on Facebook, you will not be worried about the information (similar to this) or this aweasome web of free streaming movies recomended by your friend. :D irony :)
footer.thanks: I want to thank Robin Linus for his inspirational work and the great icons by Flaicons
